Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: As explained at https://github.com/apache/couchdb/issues/1852 , $or and $in queries use an index, but they do a full scan of all documents in the index, so you don't get the expected performance of an index. Therefore GetStateMultipleKeys should use the native CouchDB bulk retrieve API - all_docs with a set of keys passed in the body. I've created FAB-18507 for this support.
